solution_line_template: Each bicycle has {wheels_per_bicycle} wheels, so there are a total of {num_bicycles}*{wheels_per_bicycle}=<<{num_bicycles}*{wheels_per_bicycle}={total_wheels}>>{total_wheels} wheels in the garage as there are {num_bicycles} bicycles.
Since each wheel has {spokes_per_wheel} spokes, this means there are {total_wheels}*{spokes_per_wheel}=<<{total_wheels}*{spokes_per_wheel}={total_spokes}>>{total_spokes} spokes in total.
